## Query.replaceOne() method

To replace existing document with new document, if key is not present new document will be inserted

**Signature:**

```typescript
replaceOne(payload: DocumentType & {
        _id: string | number;
    }, options?: IQueryReplaceOneOptions): this;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

payload


</td><td>

DocumentType &amp; { \_id: string \| number; }


</td><td>

Document object to override


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

IQueryReplaceOneOptions


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
await query.replaceOne({ $key: key }, newDoc, options);
```
